title: FS/FT: PSA 4 McGraw glove at hip EPDG - SOLD!
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: PSA 4 McGraw glove at hip EPDG - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Making my David Hall collection PSA 4 Mcgraw EPDG available for trade or sale. Paid $1066 plus taxes and shipping.....so would be asking $SOLD.

Will consider trades for a comparable Tinker Bat off EPDG or credit towards a Young with Glove EPDG (the milkman one).

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2jpe3fb][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/50145937782_69f7fe4569_c.jpg[/img][/url]

The resemblance to Young with glove is uncanny

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=410689&d=1595543507[/IMG]
I just pulled this guy out after forgetting about him!!!  Will entertain offers!
Wow Jeff, that's a SWEET card! Looks nicer than a 4 to me...  Trent King
